entries.title: Ex-ambassador says this is why Putin says he wants to negotiate
entries.description: Former US Ambassador to Ukraine William Taylor tells CNN's Wolf Blitzer why he thinks Russian President Vladimir Putin is now calling for negotiations in his war against Ukraine.

entries.title: Kim Kardashian describes challenges of co-parenting with Kanye West
All around the world, women are better empathizers than men, study finds
entries.description: No matter where they live in the world, no matter what their cultural or family influences: In general, women are better at empathizing with other people than men, according to a study published Monday in the journal PNAS.

entries.title: Americans spent like crazy during the holidays because of high inflation
entries.description: Americans upped their spending during this year's holiday season, as inflation forced consumers to shell out more for retail goods and dining experiences.

entries.title: 'Game changer': Educators raise alarm over new cheating tool that gets smarter the more its used
entries.description: A new app has made it easier to cheat and harder to catch. CNN's Abby Phillip talks to an expert in plagiarism and university educator about the new tool that runs on artificial intelligence.

entries.title: Lizzo breaks down in tears after her icon sends a personal Christmas greeting
entries.description: Lizzo had an emotional Christmas after receiving a holiday greeting from one of her icons.

entries.title: Years after viral video, triplets reunite with beloved trash collector
entries.description: Four years after a video of their daily visit with the neighborhood trash collector went viral, a set of Florida triplets got the chance to catch up with their hero. See the report from CNN affiliate WESH.

entries.title: From the McRib to the Choco Taco, here are 6 foods that went away in 2022
entries.description: 2022 marked a return to the basics for many of America's largest food companies. That left some fan favorites in the garbage heap of history.

entries.title: Putin says he is ready to 'negotiate with everyone involved' regarding Ukraine
Biden and Harris celebrate Kwanzaa in social media posts
entries.description: The White House celebrated Kwanzaa in a pair of pre-recorded videos posted to Twitter on Monday, marking the seven-day non-denominational holiday aimed at honoring African Americans' ancestral roots.

entries.title: Cher showcases incredible diamond on Twitter for Christmas... but is it an engagement ring?
entries.description: Cher had enough ice on hand for more than just holiday cocktails this weekend, but she's remaining mum for now on whether it means wedding bells are in her near future.

entries.title: China will end Covid restrictions and quarantining for international travelers
Hear why this nonprofit director thinks busing migrants could be a good option for border towns
entries.description: CNN's Sara Sidner speaks with Tatiana Laborde, managing director at SAMU First Response, which has been assisting arriving migrants, on Texas Governor Greg Abbott's decision to bus migrants to Vice President Harris' residence.

entries.title: Rare evidence that dinosaurs feasted on mammals uncovered
entries.description: Sometime during the Cretaceous Period, 120 million years ago, a dinosaur wolfed down its last meal — a small mammal the size of a mouse. And it's still there.

entries.title: Russia puts foreign investigative journalist on its 'wanted' list
entries.description: Russia has put the investigative journalist Christo Grozev on its "wanted" list, according to the Russian Interior Ministry.

entries.title: TV took us back to Westeros, Middle-earth and a galaxy far far away in 2022
entries.description: After a dreary pandemic winter, a summer surge and a deluge of distressing news in between, it felt good to have dragons on TV again.

entries.title: Business partners turn on Sam Bankman-Fried
entries.description: The stunning collapse of one of crypto's most prominent firms has quickly morphed into a legal battle pitting former executives and ex-romantic partners against one another.

entries.title: Drew Barrymore asks President Biden why he proposed five times
entries.description: In a special White House segment of her talk show, Drew Barrymore asked President Joe Biden and Dr. Jill Biden about their decades-long marriage and Christmas gift traditions.

entries.title: 'Not going great': Reporter takes inside look at Trump's reelection campaign
entries.description: In the upcoming issue of New York Magazine, Washington Correspondent Olivia Nuzzi takes a deep-dive look at former President Donald Trump's "quiet and lonely" run for reelection. CNN has reported that allies are worried about Trump's slow start and the direction of his campaign. Nuzzi joins Poppy Harlow and Sara Sidner to discuss.

entries.title: See houses frozen over by massive winter storm
entries.description: A prolonged winter storm has brought dangerously low temperatures and tons of snow to much of the US.

entries.title: McDonald's tests system that could change the fast food industry
entries.description: McDonald's opened an automated location in Texas as restaurants around the country are trying new ways to entice customers on the go.

entries.title: The most satisfying movies of 2022, from 'Avatar' to 'Everything Everywhere'
entries.description: The movie business is undergoing a transformation, fueled by declining box-office revenues as more people prefer consuming entertainment in the comfort of their homes. That also merits looking back at the movies released in 2022 in slightly different fashion, from the most disappointing titles to, here, the most satisfying.

entries.title: 'Matilda the Musical' isn't a miracle, but it is a lot of fun
entries.description: Bringing vibrant energy to the translation from book to musical to screen, "Roald Dahl's Matilda the Musical" lands on Netflix as a rewarding example of the perilous practice of building such efforts around children. Of course, it helps that the young star, Alisha Weir, is terrific, aided by wonderful turns from Emma Thompson and Lashana Lynch, extending what have already been good years for both.

entries.title: Winter weather turns last-minute Christmas gifts into New Year's presents
entries.description: In some parts of snow-buried America, last-minute Christmas gifts are turning into early New Year's presents.

entries.title: These Ukrainians need power just to stay alive, but rolling blackouts are a constant threat
entries.description: CNN's Will Ripley looks at the heightened risk for Ukrainians who rely on power for their vital medical treatments during rolling blackouts.

entries.title: The incident at Russia's Engels air base is a 'consequence of Russian aggression,' Ukrainian official says
Three Russian servicemen killed after drone shot down at air base inside Russia
Beware the 'pig butchering' crypto scam sweeping across America
entries.description: The FBI says America has a "pig butchering" problem. And it's costing victims millions of dollars.

entries.title: The gigantic tunnels and bridges linking Asia to Europe
entries.description: With sloping banks studded with elegant private mansions, palace parks and centuries-old groves, the Bosphorus is the embodiment of Istanbul.

entries.title: Mike Sievert of T-Mobile is the CNN Business CEO of the Year
entries.description: Investors saw a lot of red in 2022. But a company known for its magenta logo was a stock market darling this year.

entries.title: South Korea fires warning shots after North Korean drones enter its airspace
entries.description: Five North Korean drones crossed into South Korean airspace on Monday, prompting the South Korean military to deployed fighter jets and attack helicopters, the country's defense ministry said.

entries.title: Over 1,300 US flights canceled the day after Christmas
entries.description: In the wake of dangerously cold temperatures and winter weather across the nation, air transportation cancellations and delays continue to impact travelers Monday.

entries.title: Beijing to distribute Pfizer antiviral drug as Covid wave strains health system
entries.description: Beijing will begin distributing Pfizer's Covid-19 drug Paxlovid to the city's community health centers in the coming days, state media reported Monday.

entries.title: China's Covid surge hits factories and consumer market
entries.description: China's economy is under severe strain as a wave of Covid cases sweeps across the country.

entries.title: Three Russian servicemen killed after drone shot down at air base inside Russia
entries.description: Three Russian servicemen were killed Monday after a Ukrainian drone was shot down by air defenses as it approached a military airfield in Saratov Oblast, deep inside Russian territory, according to Russian state news agencies, citing the defense ministry.

entries.title: Dozens of Rohingya rescued from stricken vessel after weeks adrift at sea, but fears grow for those still aboard
entries.description: After spending more than a month adrift on a stricken boat without food or water, dozens of starving Rohingya have been rescued in Indonesia, the United Nations refugee agency said Sunday, offering a glimmer of hope for the persecuted group who fled their refugee camps last month in search of a better life.

entries.title: Major US winter storm kills dozens nationwide while some New York residents trapped under feet of snow
entries.description: As a massive winter storm continues to blast much of the US with brutal winter weather -- leading to at least 37 deaths nationwide -- parts of western New York have been buried by up to 43 inches of snow, leaving vehicles stuck and power out for thousands during the Christmas weekend.

entries.title: China sends 47 aircraft across Taiwan Strait in new military 'strike drill'
entries.description: China sent 47 aircraft across the median line of the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, its largest incursion into Taiwan's air defense zone in recent months, as Beijing steps-up efforts to normalize aggressive military operations around the self-ruled island.

entries.title: Six dead in Spain after bus plunges off bridge into river
entries.description: Six people died and two were injured after a passenger bus careened off a bridge and plunged into an overflowing river in northwestern Spain, emergency services said on Sunday.

entries.title: Nepal's 'fierce' ex-guerrilla chief becomes new prime minister
entries.description: A former Maoist guerrilla who led a decade-long insurgency against Nepal's Hindu monarchy was appointed prime minister on Sunday for a third time, in alliance with the main opposition after last month's election returned a hung parliament.

entries.title: Rapper Meek Mill pays bail for 20 women so they can spend the holidays at home
entries.description: Rapper Meek Mill has paid bail for 20 women so that they can spend the holidays at home, according to the REFORM Alliance, an organization he launched in 2019 alongside Jay-Z.

entries.title: The gangster-turned-cop racing to save Chinatown's underworld history
entries.description: Armed with an iPhone, a microphone and a lifetime's worth of connections with former cops and criminals, Michael Moy is racing to capture a piece of New York City's forgotten history.

entries.title: Around 14,000 customers impacted after substations in Tacoma area vandalized by burglars
entries.description: Around 14,000 customers in Puyallup and Graham, Washington, were impacted Sunday after burglars vandalized three power substations belonging to Tacoma Public Utilities and Puget Sound Energy, police said.

entries.title: Kathy Whitworth, one of the greatest golfers ever, has died
entries.description: Kathy Whitworth, the winningest golfer in history, has died at the age of 83, the Ladies Professional Golf Association announced on Sunday.

entries.title: Russia ready to resume gas supply to Europe via Yamal-Europe gas pipeline
entries.description: Russia is prepared to resume gas supplies to Europe via the Yamal-Europe gas pipeline, which was previously stopped for political reasons, Russia's Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak told Russian state news agency TASS on Sunday.

entries.title: Kidnapped baby was found in stolen car's back seat hours after suspect's arrest
entries.description: Two Indianapolis police officers had spent the day searching in vain for a missing baby in a stolen vehicle when they stopped to eat and gather their wits.
